name: Sibylline Places 01
description:
These four isometric places were drawn in January and February 2021 as part of the rewards of my Patreon’s supporters.

They are linked to the cities and locations in the series Marked Cities and Hexalege created in the same period.

They are presented without further details for you to use on your RPG game as you prefer, populate the rooms as you like and create your own explanations for what is illustrated here.

List of isometric maps in JPG high resolution:

  • Sea Gate's Drowned Grave in A4 and A3 size
  • Mapeada's Forgotten Caves in A4 and A3 size
  • Snake Ruins Outside Emblems in A4 and A3 size
  • Dungeon of the Splitted Fort in A3 and A2 size
